Item.Value: [Text:Well hello there! The name's $Character_19$. Merchant by trade, and I'm ready to get to work. If we're going to accomplish anything here, we're going to need a shop. First though, you had better talk to $Character_14$. He says we need a $Building_35$ before we can do anything else.]
[Text:Hello! You know, my family has been living in this town for over a century. It may not look like much, but this town runs in my blood.][Default]
[Text:Lovely day today, isn't it? It's a wonder what some fresh air will do for you!][Default]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Selection:Shop]
[Text:Well now, what can I do for you?][Selection:VillageTalk]
[Text:What are you doing running around today? On a day like this, you should be inside where it's warm and dry.][Weather:Raining]

[Text:My father used to tell me stories about nature spirits when I was a lad. Apparently some of them like to play in the rain. I fancy I can sometimes hear one, but I've never seen one with my own eyes.][Weather:Raining]

[Text:Ah! Good to see you again, I see that you've got the $Building_35$ up and running so now it's time to set up that shop. You just set one up for me, and I'll see to it that we can start getting in supplies.][Priority:50][CompletedTaskID:0][UnlockBuildingID:21]
